about_the_game:
Don’t Fall. Don’t Stumble. RUMBLE!

Enter the Rumble Club arena, a hilarious physics-based multiplayer Battle Royale. Grab your squad, or charge into the slapstick arena solo against 19 other players. Punch, push, throw, and bait your opponents—and maybe your friends, too…

Fly in on Captain Punch’s Sky Yacht, get bopped into the arena, and find powerful and ridiculous Gadgets to battle with. With constantly changing game modes, get ready to mix it up with your friends, from eating cupcakes to being the last Punchie standing. But not everything is winning. You’ll also want to look good while doing it.

PHYSICS FUN FOR EVERYONE!
Send foes flying with a well-timed haymaker. Got them down for the count? Throw them into the goop to finish them off. Just watch out for that massive wrecking ball swinging right towards you!



BRING A GADGET TO A FISTFIGHT!
Not all battles are won with your fists. Find silly gadgets on the battlefield for an advantage. Boombox? Punch Tank? A Giant Menacing Magic Donut? Try them all!



LOOK GOOD, PUNCH GOOD!
Collect and choose between tons of cosmetics. Fancy a Tuxedo? Wizard Hat? Mankini? Or maybe that hat with the safari flaps—I’m sure you can pull it off.



GAME MODES GALORE!
New game modes and arenas are added each season and mixed up daily! Dive into each one solo or with friends and battle to be the true champion of the arena!



RUMBLE WITH YOUR FRIENDS!
Message your friends and meet them on the battleground. Work together to complete fun Quests to earn rewards and unlock exclusive cosmetics!

Don’t Fall. Don’t Stumble. RUMBLE!

With constantly changing game modes, get ready to mix it up with your friends, from eating cupcakes to being the last Punchie standing. But not everything is winning. Send foes flying with a well-timed haymaker. Got them down for the count? Throw them into the goop to finish them off. Just watch out for that massive wrecking ball swinging right towards you!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 12+
  • Processor: 2016 Generation Macs and Newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 12+
  • Processor: 2016 Generation Macs and Newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Rumble Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam / Intel Iris Xe
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Punch your friends for free! Battle solo or squad up in clumsy chaos across an ever-changing slate of game modes with up to 20 players.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
